acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._ideaId: ID of the idea to back

returns.potentialWinnings: Amount they would win if this idea wins

params._minBackingThreshold: Minimum backing required for an idea to win

returns.backedIdeaIds: Array of idea IDs the user backed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

startRound().details: Can only be called when no round is active

params._metadata: IPFS hash or URL for additional details

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

MAX_IDEAS_PER_ROUND().notice: Maximum ideas per round to prevent DoS

MIN_BACKING_AMOUNT().notice: Minimum backing amount to prevent dust attacks

backerIndex(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Round ID => Idea ID => Backer => backing index (for lookup)

calculatePotentialWinnings(uint256,uint2.notice: Calculate potential winnings for a backer

claimWinnings(uint256).notice: Claim winnings for a resolved round

getCurrentPhase().notice: Check current phase of active round

getIdeaBackings(uint256,uint256).notice: Get all backings for an idea

getRoundIdeaIds(uint256).notice: Get all idea IDs for a round

getUserBackingForIdea(address,uint256,ui.notice: Get user's backing details for a specific idea

getUserBackings(address,uint256).notice: Get user's backings for a round

hasBacked(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Round ID => Idea ID => Backer => has backed

ideaBackings(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Round ID => Idea ID => list of backings

minBackingThreshold().notice: Minimum total backing required for an idea to be selectable as winner

roundIdeas(uint256,uint256).notice: Round ID => list of idea IDs

selectWinner(uint256).notice: Select the winning idea for a round

submitIdea(string,string).notice: Submit an idea for the current round
